name: worklink-v2
description: WorkLink recruitment platform - Admin portal and worker PWA

scripts.dev: concurrently -n server,admin,worker -c blue,green,magenta "nodemon --ignore data/ server.js" "cd admin && npm run dev" "cd worker && npm start"
scripts.dev:fresh: npm run clean && npm run dev
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:admin && npm run build:worker
scripts.build:admin: cd admin && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build:worker: cd worker && npm install && npm run build
scripts.clean: rm -rf admin/node_modules/.vite worker/node_modules/.vite admin/dist worker/dist admin/node_modules/.cache worker/node_modules/.cache 2>/dev/null; echo 'Cache cleared'
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd admin && npm install && cd ../worker && npm install

author: WorkLink
